ygData.msgSnippet: I ve just put up Openglad 0.98 for everyone to get and use. This is, as the non-enhanced branch of Openglad will forever remain, a bugfix release. Mainly, it

I've just put up Openglad 0.98 for everyone to get and use. This is, as
the non-enhanced branch of Openglad will forever remain, a bugfix release.
Mainly, it fixes the crashes that 0.97 had on retreat and, probably of the
most interest to many people here, it has working Windows joysticks! :-)

Joystick support should be just plug and play. Launch the game up with
your joystic connected and you should be able to bind keys to it. Each
direction on an axis and each button are counted as an extention to the
keyboard, so setting keys to it shouldn't be a problem. One word of
advice, though: don't bind the diagonal directions, just use some garbage
key. Diagonal motion will be handled automatically.

I also took care of a few minor Openscen annoyances, so its easier to edit
things near the edge of the map now. That's all I can remember right now,
so have at it. Snowstorm's site is at http://snowstorm.sf.net and you can
find the downloads from there.

- Yan
